Text:
It's a Nero cd image.

Why?
Is it one track only? Why??
Everyone should rip DTS CDs to .wav files.

What a mess. There's a huge glitch at the beginning of Rising Power, all the tracks fade together like on the radio, and it's a crappy homebrew matrixed surround sound "mix" that does nothing but put the differenced L+R channels in the back channels.

Foobar2000 (and I suppose a lot of other music players) can do this in software to ANY recording on the fly...so what's the point of this shit?
